name: Yeet The Axe
description:
A game made for the "GoGodot Jam 2"

       You are trying to destroy the Energy Source of the corrupted creatures on Earth

       who are teasing humans and other species since a long time.

                                                                          Controls

      Use the "D" key to move right

       "A" key to move left

      "Shift" key to throw your Axe

       "Space" to jump

   The music used in the game : https://opengameart.org/content/8bit-action-    soundtrack
